title: Looking for Nice T206's graded 5 or better
author: 823dek

posts.post_title: Looking for Nice T206's graded 5 or better
posts.post_content: Wants  nice cards not the rare  "missing nostrils or nose holes", not 1 of 1 left side of chin....GREAT  CARDS ONLY , willing to spend...not  interested in GARBAGE or male bonding cards with rounded corners and one says "GREAT CARD FREDDIE, wish I had the funds and all  ends are beveled...all rounded  corners are doctored or trimmed, paper doesnt disappear . ANYONE ?
